snippet: FRANKEL--Leonard, age 90, formerly of Port Washington, NY passed away on Wednesday, May 11, 2016. Leonard is survived by his beloved wife of 60 years Eve, as well as his loving sons Robert (Mary Ann) and Richard (Geri), and his cherished grandchildren Jason, Rebecca, Justin (Amanda), Joshua and Gregory. Leonard was a proud graduate of the Bronx High School of Science, and obtained his Bachelor's Degree from New York University. May his memory be eternal. Funeral services will be held graveside on Sunday, May 15, 2016, commencing at 1:30pm at the Beth David Cemetery in Elmont, NY. (www.IJMorrisDixHills.com). 1/3
